meet our team
Mark Joyce – General Manager
Mark Joyce serves as the General Manager of Villa Del Sol and Sebring, bringing over 12 years of experience in the Manufactured Home industry. Originally from the UK, Mark and his wife moved to the United States 35 years ago and have called the Sebring area home since 2013.
Mark began his career as a community manager at Reflections on Silver Lake in Avon Park and steadily advanced, overseeing daily operations, maintenance, new home orders, and sales for Legacy Communities. Most recently, he played a key role in the rebuilding of a 470-home community in Fort Myers that was devastated by Hurricane Ian in 2022.
With a strong passion for community development and resident engagement, Mark is excited to be part of Villa Del Sol and Sebring, and looks forward to getting to know all the residents.
Jodi Susco, Regional Operations Manager
Jodi Susco the Regional Operations Manager is originally from Minnesota and has been with Rickert Properties for over 18 years. Jodi loves to read books, spend time with family & friends, and cares for the resident’s furry friends by carrying treats in her golf cart! We are happy to have Jodi aboard our Rickert Properties team as she does an exceptional job in keeping the community looking fantastic.
Jan Johnson, Sales Manager
Invites you to visit Sebring Village to see the beautiful property and tour our exceptional inventory to find your perfect retirement home! Jan is originally from Ohio and has made Florida her home for the last 4 yrs. Jan has been in property management for 34 yrs. She loves spending time with family and friends and taking care of her 2 fur babies.
Jodi Susco, Regional Operations Manager
Jodi Susco the Regional Operations Manager is originally from Minnesota and has been with Rickert Properties for over 18 years. Jodi loves to read books, spend time with family & friends, and cares for the resident’s furry friends by carrying treats in her golf cart! We are happy to have Jodi aboard our Rickert Properties team as she does an exceptional job in keeping the community looking fantastic.

meet our team

Mark Joyce serves as the General Manager of Villa Del Sol and Sebring, bringing over 12 years of experience in the Manufactured Home industry. Originally from the UK, Mark and his wife moved to the United States 35 years ago and have called the Sebring area home since 2013.
